name: Kitten Conquest
description:
Kitten Conquest is a cute, strategy focussed game where you and your army of cats battle it out to claim victory over the living room! With a turn-based combat system and several different unit types to choose from, you'll have to out think your opponent to bring down their cat tree. With a bright colour scheme and lovable characters, kids and parents alike will find Kitten Conquest to be a challenging break from the norm and paw-ful lot of fun to play!

Gameplay

Kitten Conquest you will be acting general for the Noble Family of your choice,
commanding their troops into battle. Strategize how best to use the troops you
have at your disposal, as well as what troops you would like to create to
bolster your forces. Be careful though, as you have a limited number of troops
you can summon, so you'll have to choose wisely. Direct your troops using
Action Points to move around the living room and attack enemy troops. Units
have advantages and disadvantages according to their movements, range and
hardiness, so make sure you think about how best to engage your enemy. Your
goal is to destroy the enemy castle, the scratching post owned by the opposing
Family has claimed for themselves. Knock that cat of the post and reclaim the
living room for your Noble Cats and glory!

Story

For many years the Noble Cats of the House have feuded, each unwilling to give any inch of the Living room to the other. This feud began long ago, when Amy, Lady of the House and Giver of Scritches, allowed the Usurper, Tom of the Outside and so-called, 'boyfriend', to move in. The Tibbles Family, loyal to Lady Amy, were well established in the home and did not seek their influence to be diminished by outsiders. Worst of all, the Usurper was not alone, bringing with him Lord Roxxie of the Roxxie Family, another Noble Cat, to share the lands that the Tibbles Family had claimed years ago. To this day the feud rages on, each side battling for every toy, every box, every treat and pet from their owners. The Families calls for your aid! Defend your land in Tibble's name or conqueror new territory in Roxxie's Honour! Command their armies and conqueror the living room! Bring peace to the house once again!

Controls
Command your units using Left Mouse
Rotate the camera using Q & E
Go birds-eye mode by using TAB
Zoom in and out with Mouse Wheel
Open the Pause Menu with Escape

Music: Jazzy Frenchy from Bensound.com
